item.title: Lesson 1
item.description: 1.1 Creating named ranges. Download the file Historicalinvest.xlsx that is used in the video and practice. Exercise: Use the States.xlsx file to calculate the total sales in Arizona, California, Montana, New York, and New Jersey. Compute the total sales in a form such as AZ+CA+MT+NY+NJ instead of SUM(A21:A25). 1.2 Next Lessonn

item.title: Introduction
item.description: We shall use Microsoft Excel 2013 during the course. So I would suggest the class to install the 2013 version in their computers. Go through the syllabus uploaded in the university website. The reference book is Microsoft Excel 2013: Data Analysis and Business Modeling by Wayne L. Winston. What should you know before reading this book? Formulas should begin with an = sign. * is used for multiplication, / for division, ^ is used to raise a quantity to a power.
